subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What is the name of the first capital of Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान की पहली राजधानी क्या थी ?
explanation_en:
Amber Fort was the first capital of Rajasthan before Jaipur became the capital.
In Hindi, this means - Amber Fort राजस्थान की पहली राजधानी थी जबकि Jaipur में Jaipur बनी राजधानी बनी।

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the first Raja of Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान के पहले राजा कौन थे ?
explanation_en:
Udai Singh II was the first Mewar king who established the city of Udaipur as his capital.
